parameters.name: BstrMateReferenceName
parameters.description: Name of the new mate reference, which replaces the selected mate reference

parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for PrimaryReferenceEntity

parameters.description: Secondary mate reference entity, a pointer to an IEntity object

parameters.description: Type of mate as defined by swMateReferenceType_e for SecondaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for SecondaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Tertiary mate reference entity, a pointer to an IEntity object

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined by swMateReferenceType_e for TertiaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for TertiaryReferenceEntity

title: IMateReference.Edit
description: Lets you edit the selected mate reference.
signature:
System.Boolean Edit( 
   System.String
BstrMateReferenceName
,
   Entity
PrimaryReferenceEntity
,
   System.Int32
PrimaryReferenceType
,
   System.Int32
PrimaryReferenceAlignment
,
   Entity
SecondaryReferenceEntity
,
   System.Int32
SecondaryReferenceType
,
   System.Int32
SecondaryReferenceAlignment
,
   Entity
TertiaryReferenceEntity
,
   System.Int32
TertiaryReferenceType
,
   System.Int32
TertiaryReferenceAlignment
)

parameters.name: BstrMateReferenceName
parameters.description: Name of the new mate reference, which replaces the selected mate reference

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Primary mate reference entity, a pointer to an IEntity object

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined by swMateReferenceType_e for PrimaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for PrimaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Secondary mate reference entity, a pointer to an IEntity object

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined by swMateReferenceType_e for SecondaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for SecondaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Tertiary mate reference entity, a pointer to an IEntity object

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined by swMateReferenceType_e for TertiaryReferenceEntity

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e for TertiaryReferenceEntity

remarks:
To clear the previous references, you can pass Nothing or null for the primary, secondary, or tertiary reference entities.
This method applies the parameters to the actual features. After calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::EditRebuild
to rebuild the model, and then call
IModelDocExtension::NeedsRebuild
to determine if the rebuild was successful.
